data.title: University of the Incarnate Word
data.text:
Dean's List: Spring 2024

Congratulations on being named to the University of Incarnate Word Dean's List! Your grade point average for the Spring 2024 semester indicates that you have earned this prestigious distinction. The Incarnate Word community is proud of you for attaining this high academic achievement. Please accept this letter as my recognition of your accomplishment and my sincere appreciation of your success at the University of the Incarnate Word.

Sincerely,

Dr. Dimitri Tamalis

Interim VP for Academic Affairs and Provost

University of the Incarnate Word

To support UIW Sustainability's green efforts, we have stopped printing and mailing certificates. Instead, the dean's certificate will be emailed to the Broadway Campus and School of Professional Studies students who qualified on August 1, 2024. If you have any questions, please email deanslist@uiwtx.edu.

Deanâ€™s List Qualifications:

Earning Criteria: Admission to the Dean's List is based on achievement during a Spring or Fall semester.

The following earning criteria must be met.

GPA of 3.5 or above.

Only undergraduates who have earned at least 12 semester hours or have full-time status qualify.

No ESL or Academic Literacy courses

No IP grades. A student's name will not be posted on the Dean's List website after completing an IP but will be available on the official transcript record for the term in which the honor is earned.

*This information can be found in the UIW Undergraduate Catalog, grades and academic history policies.
